bibl.title: Berenike 1994. Preliminary Report of the 1994 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert.
bibl.note: Pp. 59-61: 11. Textual Finds, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. Brief account of the finds (small papyrus fragments, fragments of ostraca and a wax tablet, IVth-Vth centuries A.D.).
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E. and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1994. Preliminary Report of the 1994 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert.
Leiden, Research School CNWS, 1995, 8°, [vi]-127 pp., 67 figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 90-73782-41-4. Hfl. 45.
Pp. 59-61: 11. Textual Finds, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. Brief account of the finds (small papyrus fragments, fragments of ostraca and a wax tablet, IVth-Vth centuries A.D.).

C.R. par Colin Adams, JHS 119 (1999) pp. 218-219 [concerne aussi: Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1995 (Leiden, 1996)]. - Valerie Maxfield, JRA 13 (2000) pp. 698-702 [concerne aussi: Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1995 (Leiden, 1996); - Berenike 1996 (Leiden, 1998)].
